title: De Garde 24/7
overview: What do those who spend their life saving us do every day? On Duty 24/7 (De garde 24/7) allows us to get into the very heart of a hospital and witness the challenges our doctors face every day. By getting involved in their interaction with their patients, they discuss the personal challenges attached to their occupation. An exclusive web series expands on the experience of what happens on the site where the series is recorded.
